hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Abbas:That a man was with the Messenger of Allah, and his she-camel broke his neck when he was in Ihra, and he died. The Messenger of all said, Wash him with water and lote leaves, and shroud him in his two garments, and do not put any perfume on him or cover his head, for he will be raised on the Day of Resurrection reciting the Talbiyah

chapter.ara-name: باب غَسْلِ الْمُحْرِمِ بِالسِّدْرِ إِذَا مَاتَ .
chapter.eng-name: Washing The Muhrim What Lotus Leaves If He Dies
